choices: Day off from work-go to see Kristen
Go so see Matt's friend
1.content:
Your name is Matt and for the most part you're a lucky guy. You're a smart guy and have a low-level but still decent job at a large bank and are working on a masters in finance at a top program so that you can have a better job in the organization someday. Things aren't perfect with your career, but you know that things could be a lot worse. You also are super lucky in that you have an incredibly hot girlfriend named Kristen who's a successful and super sexy webcam model.

However, currently things are kind of rough for both Matt and Kristen. Neither of you come from money and though you will one day have a better paying job-you current role leaves you only enough for the bare necessities and hers pays well at times-but its unreliable and inconsistent income.
1.title: About the main character

choices: You leave and come back the next day
You can't wait-you need to know NOW
11.content:
You finally got a day off from work and you use the day to visit you girlfriend Kristen. She's a webcam model so she spends a lot of time at home with her Doberman dog Heath and sets her own hours.

After driving across town, you finally get to Kristen's apartment. The drive over was somewhat depressing. The whole way over -it was raining and you were forced to focus on both the giant crack on your windshield and the wipes that can barely function well enough to clean water off your windshield. You current job role is with a good company, but you're at the bottom of the food chain and at the moment can barely afford the bare necessities.

After arriving at Kristen's apartment-you knock on the door. There's no answer other than Heath's barking so you know she must be in the middle of a show. You quietly creek open the door to see Kristen on her couch in her sexy black lingerie with the camera's and lights all around her.

Upon seeing you- Kristen casts a cold stare and points to the bar as if to say "go wait a few minutes". After leaving you to play with Heath for a good 30 minutes-Kristen finally finishes the show and comes over to you in a striped rob. "Hey babe!" she coos.

"Hey Kristen!" you say back. "How's it going?"

As Kristen kisses you her smile turns a tear and she cries "Babe-I have bad news-this last show I did barely cleared $200 and it was meant to mean my main segment of the week"

"Oh crap-that's bad" you reply. "Unfortunately, my car has had a lot of problems recently and, on my current salary-that's pretty much cleaned me out!"

Exasperated, Kristen and you both sit on the couch to think over how to solve your current financial problems. "Matt-I think that I may have one idea that could fix our situation" she say with a glimmer of hope in her voice. A customer of mine a famous scientist and sent me a potion in the mail that could greatly "enhance" my show in exchange for giving him all of my content-and there's one more thing-using this potion involves bringing you into my show."

You looked at her puzzled. How could his potion help Kristen's show and how on earth would this involve you? You're not a bad looking guy but you're no model and surely you couldn't help her show even with this potion.

Kristen smiles at you and says "Oh-I think he's right and I think you'll be surprised at how right he is. Tell you what, babe, come back tomorrow and we'll test it to see if it works!"
11.title: Day off from work-go to see Kristen

choices: You wake up to a giant world (fast shrink)
You wake up size of a kid (slow shrink)
111.content:
After a good night's rest-you leave and come back to Kristen's the next day with nothing but questions. You arrive to see her already in her red bikini.

"Where's Heath" you ask since Heath's usually by her side during the shows. "We need to keep Heath locked in my bedroom for this show, Matt" she giggles. "It's time for you to get ready for your part now!" She hands you a small glass vile with a thick liquid in it that looked like mud. "Drink it and we'll be ready to start!" she exclaims.

You don't understand but arguing with Kristen can be painful. So you drink the vile and are surprised at how tasteless it is. After a few minutes you feel sick, dizzy and have to sit on the couch. The last thing you see is you sexy girlfriend looking over you before you pass out.
111.title: You leave and come back the next day

choices: The camera is now-time for the first ever broadcast!
Let's practice first
1111.content:
You wake up to a soft squishy peach colored world. You feel kind of chilly when you realize that you completely nude. Standing up-you can barely get an even footing on the soft squishy surface below you. What the hell is going on????

Suddenly you feel the surface beneath you levitate and you moved upwards towards a giant brown eyeball that stares intently at you. "Holy crap" you shriek "Where the hell am I??" The surface begins to levitate away from the eye a little further when you realize that the eye belongs to a giant face and it's none other than the beautiful face of you girlfriend, Kristen!!!

"Kristen-is that you?" you scream "What the hell is going on-how did you get so big?"

"Hehe-you're funny" she giggles. "I'm not any bigger-you the one who got a whoooole lot smaller!!!" She laughs revealing a beautiful and terrifying teeth larger than a Megaladon shark's teeth.

"You see, babe" she says. "That drink I gave you was a shrinking potion and now you're only about a few inches tall. Remember-how I said you were going to be a part of the show-well this is it!" she cackles.

"I don't understand, babe-how does this help anything" you cry to her.

"Well-I was recently thinking about you giantess fetish and how many other weird perverts I meet in my online room that have the same fetish as you do and thought to myself that it's too bad I can't somehow make money off of it in my show. Then this creepy scientist came in one day and offered to trade me either this or a number of other inventions for all my content being downloaded to him for free and I traded with him. So don't you see? Now I can act out all of their fetish requests with YOU as the my co-star and we can both make a fortune of the tips that they'll pay us!!!!" she exclaims giving you a giant kiss out of excitement.

"But wait" you say skeptically "Won't some of their requests kill me given the lethal nature of the giantess fetish and also how the HELL am I supposed to get back to normal size!" you yell

"With this" she laugh pulling out a vile with lightly colored liquid in it. "This is a restorative potion that will cancel out the other one's affects. As for fatal gts requests-don't worry-we'll just fake things like crush, vore stunts and if they request anything too dangerous we'll just refuse. Also don't worry about the moderators who police the site-there's no way that they'll believe this is for real-at worst they'll assume we're cheating our audience with some kind of clever digital manipulations." she winks.

Stunned-you sit down in her giant hand and finally say "Ok-well-I'm definitely not sure about this-but can you please just grow me back to normal and we'll talk about it then?" you beg.

"HA-no you little pest" she say showing some irritation in her voice. "Why do think I'm dressed for the show and shrunk you down. We're going to do the first live action giantess show now-I thought you be eager to help me-not just sit around and mope like a microscopic little bitch!" she barks.

You gaze up at you powerful goddess of a girlfriend and realize that she's serious and to argue with her is pointless. Plus, you really did want to help her since this would help bring in some much needed cash to both of you. "Ok, Kristen-let's do this!" you gulp.

"Ahhhhhhh!" she screams shaking your whole body. "Thank you, Matt-you're the best boyfriend ever. The camera is already set up-let's get going!!" she squeals.
1111.title: You wake up to a giant world (fast shrink)

choices: First giantes request: Prove he's really shrunk!
First request: Eat him!!
11111.content:
She sets on the table in front of the camera and lights and walks over to her laptop logging on to the webcam chatting site. You see the red lights activate and her room begins to fill with users. All of them seemed relatively bored and weren't saying anything other than generic chatroom comments like "Hey Sexy" "Nice piece o' ass", etc. After waiting for about 30 minutes the room had swelled to a few hundred users and Kristen made the announcement. "Hello all you lucky pervs-tonight you in for a very special treat. I know how all of you are requesting that my boyfriend comes on the cam with me and you pervs are also asking me to do more fetish requests. Well guess what-tonight my boyfriend Matt and I will be performing the ultimate fetish request!"

She turned around and faced the cameras towards you on table. The bright lights flashed all around you and Kristen walked over to the table her footsteps creating vibrations akin to those of T-Rex.

"Here he is guys!" Kristen pointed directly at you. "I shrunk my boyfriend using a secret potion and now both he and I are ready to perform any gts request you have with only 1 rule: NO LETHAL or life-threatening requests"

The room lit up with comments raging from quickly contrived requests, denials of the legitimacy of Kristen's claims, and some guys just saying shit like "OMG, OMG" over and over again. Kristen looked down at you and winked "It's showtimes little guy!"
11111.title: The camera is now-time for first gts broadcast...

choices: Vore
Feet
Bring in Heath!!! :(
111111.content:
One of the users named "sarniawinters" came up with the first tip request that was actually backed by a serious tip offer. "I'm offering a tip of 5000 tokens ($500) if you can prove that Matt is really shrunken."

"Ok, sarnia, your wish is our command-tip and we'll commence!" Sarnie tipped and the Kristen left the room. She came back with a number of small objects including an army man, a ruler, a magnifying glass, a toothpick, and a worm. First she layed the army man next to you for a size comparison. The little plastic man was actually slightly taller than you and upon trying to push him away-you discovered that he was also about the same weight.

Next she picked up the ruler and set it upright to measure you. "See guys, there you have it-my boyfriend barely reaches to 2 inch marker point!" After this, she plays with the magnifying glass altering the appearance of your size until it's time for the ultimate test. She takes the worm-which to you looks like an anaconda sets it next to you and hands you a toothpick as a sword. "Now watch Matt, the microscopic gladiator face off with the giant worm" she laughs. Even though you know the worm can't actually bite you-still the site of it is quiet disturbing and you want to run away, but then remember that this want Kristen wanted (and want sarnia had tipped $500 for). You smack the worm a few time using the blunt part of the toothpick (since you didn't want to actually hurt him) and finally give him a little prick with the pointy end. The worm immediately recoils and contracts back from your actions in a way that could only be done from receiving real damage.

The comments board lights up with applause and comments of disbelief. The room had now swelled to almost 700 users and some of the were starting to make some very tantalizing new tip offers and requests for you and Kristen.
111111.title: First giantes request: Prove he's really sh...

choices: Time for Kristen to "eat" you
Something else??
1111111.content:
Of all the requests-one is being requested far more than the others "Eat him! Eat him!" the room chants in chorus. Streams of small and insignificant tips are poured into the room but none remotely fitting of the magnitude of the request. Finally one top user submits a tip of a whopping 15,000 tokens ($1500).

"Wow" Kristen gasps when she sees the tip. She look down at you and shrugs "Oh well, Matt-I guess that one was bound to happen given that it's one of the most popular gts fantasies" She looks back at the camera. "Ok-guys how do you want me to eat him".

The room explodes with suggestions but one stands out a the most popular "Make him into a SANDWICH!" they all scream. Complying with their demands, Kristen scoops you up in her hand and takes you to the kitchen counter setting you on the cutting board. She walks over to the fridge returning with all the necessary ingredients (bread, mayonnaise, tomatoes, mustard, and bologna. She picks you up and lays you on your back on top of a slice of bologna then proceeding to wrap it around you like a blanket. She repeats with a few more slice of bologna setting them on bread and covering it all with mustard and mayonnaise and tomatoes and finally completing it with another slice of bread.

She then walks back over to the computer to show the room her next "meal".
1111111.title: Vore

choices: He tips for a more extreme request
He tips for another sandwich request
11111111.content:
The room goes wild when Kristen holds up the sandwich to the camera to reveal your head poking out of one of the bologna rolls. "EAT HIM" "Crush his bone!" they scream.

Kristen lifts up the sandwich to her godzilla-sized face and smiles a frightening white smile at you facing your side of the sandwich turns her teeth. She then laughs and turn the sandwich back around taking a bite out of the side without you in it. She continues to take more bites carefully eating all around your roll of bologna until there's only a small bit of sandwich left around your slice of meat.

The room by this point is practically beside itself with the crowd now near 10,000 all of them tipping 100's of tokens and begging her to eat you.

Kristen then lifts the last bit of sandwich to her mouth and casts smiles at you and then the camera. "Wait-what is she doing!" you think to yourself. She then sucks your roll of bologna out of the sandwich with you in it!

You're suddenly in a dark wet prison of Kristen's mouth but still rapped up in your protective meat roll. Suddenly you then feel the meat unraveling and roll out onto Kristen's soft enormous tongue. The surface beneath you suddenly rockets and tosses you to the side of Kristens mouth against her cheek. You then see the meat slide into down her throat and she then spits you out back onto her hand.

The room is going crazy with applause and tips-most of them seemed a mix of shocked and relieved that Kristen didn't actually eat you, but a few seem almost a little disappointed that she didn't. Suddenly one user does something truly shocking.
11111111.title: Time for Kristen to "eat" you

choices: She comes back out
You run in to check up on her
111111111.content:
One user who's colored grey which hints that he rarely tips much tips a whopping 40,000 tokens ($4000). Both you and Kristen's jaws drop in shock.

"What was that for, sir" Kristen says. "Do you want another sandwich or something else."

The user suddenly replies "No-well I mean you can make him into a sandwich if you want but that request for for you to eat him again-this time FOR REAL"

You get a cold lifeless feeling when you see the words on the screen. Kristen wasn't supposed to do anything lethal but this was the largest tip she'd ever received on the site and your girlfriend always had had a materialistic, money-driven side to her her that sometimes scared you. She wouldn't actually listen to him-would she?

Kristen pounds the computer in rage. "I said NO lethal requests guys!" she exclaims. "Ok-that's enough, guys, the show is over-sir message me privately to get a refund for your tip-but for now we're done!". She turns off the computer and storm off to her bedroom to change.
111111111.title: He tips for a more extreme request

choices: So when's the next show??
I'm NEVER doing that again
1111111111.content:
She come back out in jeans and a t-shirt-she still has a pissed, almost tearful look to her face and then sits on the couch. She scoops you up in her hands and gives you a big kiss. "Oh babe-I'm sorry about that last guy's request-I was having so much fun up until then, I mean-the thought that I would actually kill my own boyfriend for money so disgusted me that I still feel sick!" she said with a slight tear now dripping off her face and almost drenching you in the process.

"It's ok, Kristen-it's over now" you say in an attempt to comfort her. "However, maybe it's time now to grow me back to normal-pleeeeeeeeeeeeease!!!!!"

She laughs "Oh sure-babe "running over to the refrigerator and bringing back a light colored vile of liquid she take a droplet of it on finger and offers it to you.

You guzzle the droplet of her fingertip-expecting a similar experience to the shrinking-after a few moments you then feel a horrible violent pain. Instead of going unconscious-you feel your bones and muscles expanding you scream and suddenly your giant world starts returning to normal. Before you know it-you staring your now seemingly small girlfriend in the eye and breath a sigh of relief.
1111111111.title: She comes back out

choices: No prob,, she loves lettuce in sandwiches!
111111112.content: The user tips 1000 tokens, and pleads her to "eat you in a sandwich, but add lettuce for an additional crunch!"
111111112.title: He tips for another sandwich request

info.brief_description: Get ready to be a prop in your webcam model girlfriend's act-lol
info.description: Your girlfriend is a webcam model for a popular site. In desperate attempt to make more $$$-she recruits you, her boyfriend as part of her act on her online show. Only problem is that your role in her show will be a rather "minor" role...
